hymn.title: Wonderf'lly, Wonderf'lly
hymn.chords: | C - - - | C - C/E - | F - Dm - | G - G7/B - | C - G7 - | C - C/E - | F - Dm - | G - G7/B - | C F/C C - |

layout.singingstanza: Won -- der -- f'lly, won -- der -- f'lly, God made me won -- der -- f'lly, When I look, I can see I'm just fine. I'm de -- signed per -- fect -- ly, Don't need changed, no sir -- ee! This same face has been in style A long, long while.
layout.sheetcopyright: www.hymnal.net; © 2014 Bible StorySongs, Inc. Used by permission.

lyrics.stanza: Wonderf'lly, wonderf'lly, God made me wonderf'lly, When I look, I can see I'm just fine. I'm designed perfectly, Don't need changed, no sir-ee! This same face has been in style A long, long while.

Ears that hear, they're so dear! Nose to smell, very well! And two eyes taking pictures constantly. (click, click) With my mouth I can feed, Drink and sing, pray and read Thank You, Lord, You made me Wonderf'lly!
